channel.title: 3D – GAME ONLINE
channel.description: GAME ACRADE - HTML5 FREE PLAY ONLINE

item.title: Bike Stunt Racing Legend
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap […]
item.content:encoded:
Bike Stunt Racing Legend is a balanced stunt simulation game. You are required to ride the motorbike to the finish line. Don’t be afraid of rolling ramps, pass the green arrows to speed up more easily. Keep calm and step on the gas!
On PCW = forwardS = backA = liftD = pressR = flipOn MobileTap the buttons on the screen

item.title: Angry City Smasher
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Angry City Smasher is a third-person RPG fighting simulation game. Your goal is to defeat the enemy monster and destroy the marked number of buildings. Use the Ultimate Smash to make AOE damage and destroy more buildings with one hit.On PCWASD = moveE = smash the groundF = attack with clawOn MobileTap buttons on the […]
item.content:encoded:
Angry City Smasher is a third-person RPG fighting simulation game. Your goal is to defeat the enemy monster and destroy the marked number of buildings. Use the Ultimate Smash to make AOE damage and destroy more buildings with one hit.
On PCWASD = moveE = smash the groundF = attack with clawOn MobileTap buttons on the screen

item.title: My Little Universe
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: My Little Universe is an idle adventure game with 3D models. You can control a stickman warrior to discover the whole universe by collecting resources and unlocking new areas. When you step on the white lighting areas, you will know the resource request of the next area. Get close to any items to collect them […]
item.content:encoded:
My Little Universe is an idle adventure game with 3D models. You can control a stickman warrior to discover the whole universe by collecting resources and unlocking new areas. When you step on the white lighting areas, you will know the resource request of the next area. Get close to any items to collect them automatically.
On PC and MobileDrag the wheel = move

item.title: 2048 Cube Shooting Merge
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: 2048 Cube Shooting Merge is a casual puzzle game. Merge the number blocks, bounce, and merge the blocks to get a new number block. This game is in 3D with crazy fun physics!On PCSlide the block to play.On MobileSlide the block to play.
item.content:encoded:
2048 Cube Shooting Merge is a casual puzzle game. Merge the number blocks, bounce, and merge the blocks to get a new number block. This game is in 3D with crazy fun physics!
On PCSlide the block to play.On MobileSlide the block to play.

item.title: Cube Animal Drift 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Cube Animal Drift 3D is a casual platform parkour game. You collect all kinds of cute animal skins and costumes. You should select the right clothes. Many obstacles are waiting for you on the road. If the animal collides with an obstacle, its costume will be knocked off by the obstacle.PCMouse click and drag to […]
item.content:encoded:
Cube Animal Drift 3D is a casual platform parkour game. You collect all kinds of cute animal skins and costumes. You should select the right clothes. Many obstacles are waiting for you on the road. If the animal collides with an obstacle, its costume will be knocked off by the obstacle.
PCMouse click and drag to playMobileTap and slide to play

item.title: Honor Of Kings Online
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: King of Kings Online is an exciting tower defense strategy PVP game. You will be transformed into a hero. Your ultimate goal is cooperating with your team and attacking the local energy towers while preventing your side’s energy towers from being stolen! The first team to capture an energy tower wins.PCMouse click and drag to […]
item.content:encoded:
King of Kings Online is an exciting tower defense strategy PVP game. You will be transformed into a hero. Your ultimate goal is cooperating with your team and attacking the local energy towers while preventing your side’s energy towers from being stolen! The first team to capture an energy tower wins.
PCMouse click and drag to move, and click the button to attackMobileTap and slide to move,  and tap the button to attack

item.title: Construction Set 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Construction Set 3D is a casual online game. Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. The colorful pieces and lively scenes make this building game a hoot for builders of all ages! In Constructor 3D, you never have to worry about losing a piece or prying bricks apart and […]
item.content:encoded:
Construction Set 3D is a casual online game. Find the right piece and simply tap to add it to your build. The colorful pieces and lively scenes make this building game a hoot for builders of all ages! In Constructor 3D, you never have to worry about losing a piece or prying bricks apart and hurting your fingers, because it’s all virtual!
On PCClick on the screen to play.On MobileClick on the screen to play.

item.title: Home Design 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Home Design 3D is a cleaning and decorating room game. Clear the garbage in the room and paint all the walls. Design the furniture in the room and edit any object by modifying its size, color, position, and location on the wall. If you want to change, you can use the undo or redo function […]
item.content:encoded:
Home Design 3D is a cleaning and decorating room game. Clear the garbage in the room and paint all the walls. Design the furniture in the room and edit any object by modifying its size, color, position, and location on the wall. If you want to change, you can use the undo or redo function at any time.
PCWASD or arrow keys to move, click to playMobileTap and slide to move,  tap to play

item.title: Tidy Life – Organizer 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Tidy Life – Organizer 3D is a management simulation game. You need to complete various organizing tasks within a limited time, including organizing your room, doing laundry, and keeping everything organized.PCClick on items and drag them to move.Mobile & TabletTouch the screen to move.
item.content:encoded:
Tidy Life – Organizer 3D is a management simulation game. You need to complete various organizing tasks within a limited time, including organizing your room, doing laundry, and keeping everything organized.
PCClick on items and drag them to move.Mobile & TabletTouch the screen to move.

item.title: Hexa Sort 3D
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Hexa Sort 3D is a puzzle challenge game that merges strategic matching and a satisfying merging experience. Accumulate a certain number of hexagons of the same color and they’re going to be eliminated. Stacks of hexagons are of different colors. You need to consider where to place them to eliminate them faster.On PCDrag the hexagon […]
item.content:encoded:
Hexa Sort 3D is a puzzle challenge game that merges strategic matching and a satisfying merging experience. Accumulate a certain number of hexagons of the same color and they’re going to be eliminated. Stacks of hexagons are of different colors. You need to consider where to place them to eliminate them faster.
On PCDrag the hexagon to play.On MobileDrag the hexagon to play.
